::Grounded::
Grounded hanged on to Windlord with his good hand. He thought back to
the fight and was confused.  'How do I know i am going with the right
faction'thought to himself. "Can i trust this Windlord..he did help
fight with me without even knowing me or what my faction was...I guess
time will tell'

"Are we almost to your base...I fear i am still leaking quickly and
losing strength fast."
